--- title: "St. Neots Half Marathon" date: "2019-11-17" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2019-11-17_ST._NEOTS_HALF_MARATHON/img/00.png categories: [race report, run] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2019-11-17_ST._NEOTS_HALF_MARATHON/img/00.png) Not much memories on this. Just that I got there way too early, it was raining, and I had to wait in the car while they opened registration. Also, there was no changing rooms, everybody was getting ready in a gym hall. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
